job_info.title: Developer Technology Engineer - AI
job_info.description:
Developer Technology Engineer focused on AI technologies.
                Work on cutting-edge AI/ML solutions with NVIDIA's GPU computing platform.
requirements: Deep learning and machine learning expertise
Experience with LLM and transformer models

highlights: Deployed on Thor, Orin, Jetson platforms with 4x latency reduction
CureAgent framework, Executor-Analyst architecture, tool-augmented reasoning
Deployed Ollama, llama.cpp, vllm, TensorRT-LLM, mlc-llm
